# The `LoopBlocksRPO` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Wrapper class to <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopblocksdfs">LoopBlocksDFS</a> that provides a standard <a href="#a4099996149ec5036176fcb6bcaeba2ac">begin()</a>/end() interface for the DFS reverse post-order traversal of blocks in a loop body. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

## Description {#details}

Wrapper class to <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopblocksdfs">LoopBlocksDFS</a> that provides a standard <a href="#a4099996149ec5036176fcb6bcaeba2ac">begin()</a>/end() interface for the DFS reverse post-order traversal of blocks in a loop body.

Definition at line 172 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopiterator-h">LoopIterator.h</a>.
